name: Denpa Feel
description:
Denpa Feel is a competitive multiplayer party game where you try to surf data waves in order to win.

INSTRUCTIONS

Touch the top of a block to score a point. First player to score 100 points wins. You can shoot other players to blow them away. Every once in a while a shockwave will push all players to the left.

CONTROLS

Keyboard:

  • Player 1:
    • Move Left - W
    • Move Right - D
    • Shoot - J
    • Float - K
  • Player 2:
    • Move Left - Left Arrow
    • Move Right - Right Arrow
    • Shoot: Numpad 1
    • Float - Numpad 2

Gamepad:

  • Movement - Left Analog Stick
  • Float - Button 3
  • Shoot - Button 8

Only players 1 & 2 use the keyboard.

All players have controller supported.

DESCRIPTION

During the 2096 great leak the top 4 hackers decide it's time to capture data the cutest way possible. Using their avatars they must surf the data waves to capture as much packets as they can, it's not an easy task considering the contestants can knock each other out of the wave.


Join these hackers in this extremely cute and funny game, compete with your friends in this couch party game for up to 4 players.


CREDITS

Pal - Programming, Art

Sapo de Batalla - Music
